General.Name: Taiwan Wax Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Wax Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells refined wax in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers refined paraffin wax, microcrystalline wax, and light/heavy foots oil wax. It also trades in equipment and aquatic products; and offers brokerage services. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.1, Chung Cheng Rd, Chiayi, Taiwan
